modShortDescription: A radioactive zone in the wasteland biome that kills the player without a hazmat mask. More dangerous zombies in it. Loot is better than regular biomes.
modDescription:
A radioactive zone in the wasteland biome that kills the player without a hazmat mask. More dangerous zombies in it. Loot is better than regular [biomes](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-biomes/).

Added version that you need a full hazmat suit.

Players do not need to download when entering the server.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1TGIUxGFjhwmI9wG2molP7ENlYsGWfnMv?usp=sharing)** Radiation Wasteland  
**[Download](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1JLlzpHNlrHdDXhWXv9E1gRGiS0YYBIDM?usp=sharing)** Full Hazmat Suit

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://discord.gg/sYjzfXPPya).

**Credits:** gemini
